department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班
department.en: PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine

goal.ch: 介紹電腦輔助分析與診斷在臨床醫學的應用
goal.en: Introduction of computer-aided analysis and diagnosis systems for clinical application

outline.ch: "電腦輔助分析與診斷: 5週書報討論: 5週實驗設計: 4週實驗結果分析: 4週"
outline.en: "Computer-aided analysis and diagnosis: 5 weeksLiterature survey and review: 5 weeksExperiment design: 4 weeksExperiment result analysis: 4 weeks"

textbook.ch: "(參考書) Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning by Christopher M. Bishop(參考書) Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn,Keras & TensorFlow by Aurelien Geron"
textbook.en: "(Reference) Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning by Christopher M. Bishop(Reference) Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn,Keras & TensorFlow by Aurelien Geron"

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗
個別指導

ch.competencies: 轉譯醫學與臨床問題締合
數據分析、邏輯推演與建模預測
智慧財產價值創新、維護與尊重

ch: 系所:限生醫科學與工程學系、生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班、生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊博士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程博士班。
